name: Exiled (The AZ Game Dev)
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED!!

Uh oh! You've been exiled from your tribe! You need to collect 10 wood planks to build a home. The thing is, you only have 10 seconds before nightfall! Can you collect all 10 pieces of wood before nightfall?

DISCLAIMER:

I am not sure if the Mac and Linux versions work so please let me know if they do or don't.
